channel.title: [Delta]How to change client skin color/frame color?
channel.description: What i mean my skin color is that you know how you open of a delta client it has the color of the frame red, black, or exc. Well I want to change my frame color, which is red, to black, yet I never really messed with the client side of my runescape private server and just wondering how would I do this? Thanks for your help
